Local Search Audit

Featuring the same Name, Address and Phone number (NAP) consistently across all search platforms and directories plays a huge part in how well Google ranks you in local search. Get a detailed report of where your business is indexed and where your NAP listing needs to be fixed, plus recommendations on how to optimize your most important listings. Boost your local search rankings and improve your SEO.

Social media influences how customers perceive your brand and ultimately impacts their decision making. Are you making the right impression? Get feedback on your content and performance on your two most important channels, as well as practical advice on how you can improve performance. I will also include a one-week content calendar to help guide your future efforts.

Customer Journey Mapping

Are you feeling stuck but not sure what's getting in the way of your team's success? Whether it's your sales, support, or tech team that are having a hard time, creating a customer journey map can be a powerful tool for capturing insight. During this series of in-house workshops, we'll do a deep dive into your business processes to discover what parts are, or are not, serving your customers and your team, so you can take action to improve the experience.
